name: Italian Pizza Dough
author: Ignazia Vella
summary: My home-made pizza dough; I make it 3 to 4 times a week.
directions: Stir yeast and sugar into lukewarm water, using a fork
Let stand in a warm place until a creamy layer forms on top of the water, about 10 minutes
Mix flour and salt in a large bowl
Mix olive oil into flour and stir for 2 minutes
Pour yeast mixture and beaten egg into flour mixture and stir to make a stiff dough
Turn dough out onto a floured work surface and knead until springy and smooth, about 8 minutes
Place dough into a floured bowl and cover with a piece of plastic wrap wiped with a thin film of olive oil
Let dough rise until doubled, about 1 hour
Punch down and roll out to desired shape
